    1: import numpy as np
    2: import pytest
    3: 
    4: from pandas import (
    5:     DataFrame,
    6:     NaT,
    7:     Series,
    8:     Timestamp,
    9: )
   10: 
   11: 
   12: @pytest.mark.parametrize(
   13:     "data,exp_size",
   14:     [
   15:         # see gh-16362.
   16:         ([[NaT, "a", "b", 0], [NaT, "b", "c", 1]], 8),
   17:         ([[NaT, "a", 0], [NaT, "b", 1]], 6),
   18:     ],
   19: )
   20: def test_maybe_infer_to_datetimelike_df_construct(data, exp_size):
   21:     result = DataFrame(np.array(data))
   22:     assert result.size == exp_size
   23: 
   24: 
   25: def test_maybe_infer_to_datetimelike_ser_construct():
   26:     # see gh-19671.
   27:     result = Series(["M1701", Timestamp("20130101")])
   28:     assert result.dtype.kind == "O"
